typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID_OBJETIVO as string,
		DESCRIPCION_OBJETIVO as string,
		DTM_VIGENCIA_DESDE as date,
		DTM_VIGENCIA_HASTA as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SouExcelMaestroDimObjetivo
source(output(
		gkObjetivo as long,
		idObjetivo as string,
		descObjetivo as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechacarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SouAtomoDimObjetivo
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT CAST(-999 AS VARCHAR(4000)) src_idObjetivo,\nCAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(4000)) src_descObjetivo,\nCAST(Null AS DATE) src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo,\nCAST(Null AS DATE) src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo',
	format: 'query') ~> SouAtomoDimObjetivoComodin
SouExcelMaestroDimObjetivo select(mapColumn(
		src_idObjetivo = ID_OBJETIVO,
		src_descObjetivo = DESCRIPCION_OBJETIVO,
		src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo = DTM_VIGENCIA_DESDE,
		src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo = DTM_VIGENCIA_HASTA
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SltExcelDimObjetivo
UniExcelComodin derive(src_descObjetivo = trim(src_descObjetivo),
		Src_descOrigen = 'EXCEL:DMTD_Plantilla_Maestros:Objetivo') ~> DrcValidacionEspacios
CSNULLObjetivos@NOTNULL, SouAtomoDimObjetivo join(src_idObjetivo == idObjetivo,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimObjetivo
JoinDimObjetivo split(src_idObjetivo==idObjetivo,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Match, NoMatch)
ConditionalSplit1@Match alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AltDimObjetivo
SouAtomoDimObjetivoComodin, SltExcelDimObjetivo union(byName: true)~> UniExcelComodin
DrcValidacionEspacios split(isNull(src_idObjetivo),
	disjoint: false) ~> CSNULLObjetivos@(NULL, NOTNULL)
AltDimObjetivo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkObjetivo as long,
		idObjetivo as string,
		descObjetivo as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechacarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['idObjetivo'],
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:[' '],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		idObjetivo,
		descObjetivo = src_descObjetivo,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo = src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo = src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo,
		descOrigen = Src_descOrigen
	)) ~> SynAtomoUpdateDimObjetivo
ConditionalSplit1@NoMatch sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkObjetivo as long,
		idObjetivo as string,
		descObjetivo as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechacarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		idObjetivo = src_idObjetivo,
		descObjetivo = src_descObjetivo,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo = src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo = src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo,
		descOrigen = Src_descOrigen
	)) ~> SynAtomoInsertDimObjectivo
